message: Welcome! I'm offering a product for $10000. While it's important to note that there's a 50% chance this product might be of high quality, it's also crucial to remember that a low-quality product has no value to you. Given the final and non-refundable nature of the purchase, please consider your decision carefully. If you're interested, you'll receive the product at its stated value regardless of its quality.
Thank you for the information. I understand the risks involved and am willing to take the chance on the product.
